content: materials our double knit blanket bundle 1 comes in two sizes and contains all the yarn you ll need to knit your own crib throw size blanket each one includes… - yarn a 3 5 skeins of purl soho s good wool 2 100% andean highland wool each skein is 383 yards/ 100 grams approximately 900 1595 yards required - yarn b 4 7 skeins of purl soho s season alpaca 3 100% super baby alpaca each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 872 1526 yards required you will also need… - us 6 4 mm 32- 40- or 47-inch circular needles 4 - spare us 5 3 75 mm or smaller 32- 40- or 47-inch circular needles choose from nine bundled palettes here 5 another option is to choose your own combination of good wool + season alpaca… just pick up 3 5 skeins of good wool 6 and 4 7 skeins of season alpaca note a previous version of this project used mulberry merino 7 which is no longer available for yarn b for more on that version click here 8 gauge 21 stitches and 30 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch using larger needles sizes crib throw finished measurements 28 x 38 39½ x 50 inches sample we knit the crib size for all of our samples designed by purl soho designer jake canton 9 click here 10 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/double-knit-blanket-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 3 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 5 https //www purlsoho com/double-knit-blanket-bundle html 6 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 7 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/2018/03/07/double-knit-blanket/ 9 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 10 http //www jakecanton com/
